Module.Content:
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en-us"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Full Screen Mario</title>
<link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/mario.css" rel="stylesheet"> <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/Fonts/stylesheet.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/data.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/editor.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/gamepad.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/generator.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/library.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/load.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/maps.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/mario.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/sprites.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/things.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/toned.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/triggers.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/upkeep.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/utility.js"></script>
<!-- Refactored libraries/frameworks under /src --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/src/AudioPlayr/AudioPlayr.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/src/TimeHandlr/TimeHandlr.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/karol-f/Fullscreenmario@master/src/QuadsKeepr/QuadsKeepr.js"></script>
</head> <body onload="FullScreenMario()"> </body> </html>
